Post.title: Git Learning
Post._content:
### reopsitory
,RepoGit

local RepoRemote Repo
local repository <<====>> remote repository

c:/user/admin/git/Repolocal fileremote file 
local directory(c:/user/admin/git/*) <<====>> https://github.com/username/repository  


### Branch
GitSVN

GitSVN
{% img "multiple world" /2018/04/05/Git-Learning/multiple-world.png %}

### Github

{% img "diagram of Repository" /2018/04/05/Git-Learning/repository.png %}

### Useful Command
####  repo
    admin@admin-PC MINGW64 ~   
    $ mkdir git  
    $ cd git  
    $ pwd  
    /c/Users/admin/git  
    $ git init   

#### 
	$ git add README.txt  
	$ git commit -m "discript what have done in files" //`

Gitaddcommitcommitadd
{% img "work around" /2018/04/05/Git-Learning/workround.png %}

#### git
	$ git status 

#### 
	$ git diff file 


#### commit log
	$ git log 		
commit id

#### reset
	$ git reset --hard HEAD^ 
 HEADcommit idHEAD^HEAD~100100100... commit id commit id**HEAD**


#### reform log
	$ git reflog 
commit id - HEAD - actions

	$ git reflog
	a944eee (HEAD -> master) HEAD@{0}: commit: vertion 2: added time.
	be90283 HEAD@{1}: commit (initial): edit the readme file

#### checkout
	$ git checkout -- file   
git reset HEAD file

####remove file

	$ git rm file 
checkout

#### remote repository
GitSVNSVNGit K.Oremote repository NowGithub---remote repositorygit server

	$ git remote add origin git@github.com:username/repository   //remote git
	$ git remote add origin  https://github.com/username/repositor 	//remote repo

#### push
	$ git push -u origin master 	//remote

#### clone
	$ git clone git@github.com:username/repository 		//remoteSSH
	$ git clone https://github.com/username/repository 		//https

#### swich branch
	$ git checkout -b branchname 		

	$ git branch branchname
	$ git checkout branchname

#### check branch
	$ git branch
#### merge branch
	$ git merge branchname (--no-ff)
branchno off fast forwardbranch mergeworkaroundbranch

#### delete branch
	$ git branch -d branchname

### Git learning review
Git[Git Learning](https://www.liaoxuefeng.com/wiki/0013739516305929606dd18361248578c67b8067c8c017b000/)

Post.title: Hexo Learning
Post._content:
_blogHexo_

### what is Hexo?
Hexo Hexo  Markdown

###  Hexo


Node.js
Git

 npm  Hexo

	$ npm install -g hexo-cli

### 
 Hexo Hexo 

	$ hexo init <folder>
	$ cd <folder>
	$ npm install

  
>.
> _config.yml
> package.json
> scaffolds
> source
>|      _drafts
>|      _posts
> themes


### 
**_config.yml** --   
**package.json** -- EJS, Stylus  Markdown renderer   
  
{% codeblock package.json [lang:json] %}
{
  "name": "hexo-site",
  "version": "0.0.0",
  "private": true,
  "hexo": {
    "version": ""
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "hexo": "^3.0.0",
    "hexo-generator-archive": "^0.1.0",
    "hexo-generator-category": "^0.1.0",
    "hexo-generator-index": "^0.1.0",
    "hexo-generator-tag": "^0.1.0",
    "hexo-renderer-ejs": "^0.1.0",
    "hexo-renderer-stylus": "^0.2.0",
    "hexo-renderer-marked": "^0.2.4",
    "hexo-server": "^0.1.2"
  }
}
{% endcodeblock %}

**scaffolds** --  Hexo  scaffold 
Hexomarkdownscaffold/post.mdFront-matter

**source** --  _posts  _ () / Markdown  HTML  public 
**themes** --  Hexo 

### Tag Plugins
**Quota**

	{% blockquote [author[, source]] [link] [source_link_title] %}
	content
	{% endblockquote %}

**Code**
  
	{% codeblock [title] [lang:language] [url] [link text] %}
	code snippet
	{% endcodeblock %}

**Image**

	{% img [class names] /path/to/image [width] [height] [title text [alt text]] %}
*path start with the public folder*

### Hexo extension packages
**deploy to git website**  

	$ npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
	$ hexo d -g
**enable search feature**
  
	$ npm install hexo-generator-search  --save
**enable acticle wordcount**

	$ npm install hexo-wordcount --save
**enable generate tag feature and pages**

	$ npm install hexo-generator-tag --save
**enable website search feature**

	$ npm install hexo-generator-searchdb --save

### Hexo documentation
Hexo[](https://hexo.io/docs/index.html)

Post.title: Markdown Quick Guide
Post._content:
*MarkdownHTMLMarkdownhtml1-2*

##   
 
### 
Markdown 

###  HTML
Markdown 

### 
 HTML  <  &  < &  HTML  <  &

## 

### 


### 
 1  6  # 1  6 
	#  H1
	
	##  H2
	
	######  H6
	
### blockquotes
 > 
> This is a blockquote with two paragraphs. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet,
consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aliquam hendrerit mi posuere lectus.
Vestibulum enim wisi, viverra nec, fringilla in, laoreet vitae, risus.


>
> > This is nested blockquote.
>
> Back to the first level

### 

	*   Red
	*   Green
	*   Blue


	1.  Bird
	2.  McHale
	3.  Parish

*  3 
*  4  1 
*  8  2 
* --:
	1986\. What a great season.

### 
 Markdown  4  1 



    


### 


	* * *

	***

	*****

	- - -

	---------------------------------------

## 
### 
:

	This is [an example](http://example.com/ "Title") inline link.
	
	[This link](http://example.net/) has no title attribute.
	
	See my [About](/about/) page for details.


	This is [an example][id] reference-style link.

	* 
	* 
	* 
	* 
	*  title 


	I get 10 times more traffic from [Google] [1] than from
	[Yahoo] [2] or [MSN] [3].
	
		[1]: http://google.com/        "Google"
		[2]: http://search.yahoo.com/  "Yahoo Search"
		[3]: http://search.msn.com/    "MSN Search"

### 
Markdown \*_ \*  _  <em\>  \*  _  <strong\>

	*single asterisks*
*single asterisks*

	_single underscores_
_single underscores_

	**double asterisks**
**double asterisks**

	__double underscores__
__double underscores__

### 
`

	Use the `printf()` function.


### 
Markdown  


	![Alt text](/path/to/img.jpg)

	![Alt text](/path/to/img.jpg "Optional title")


	![Alt text][id]
	[id]: url/to/image  "Optional title attribute"

	
## 
### 

Markdown 

	\   
	`   
	*   
	_   
	{}  
	[]  
	()  
	#   
	+   
	-   
	.   
	!   

### 
 Markdown 

	<http://example.com/>


## Markdown 
Windows 
* [MarkdownPad](http://markdownpad.com/) 
* [MarkPad](http://code52.org/DownmarkerWPF/)

Linux 
* [ReText](http://sourceforge.net/p/retext/home/ReText/)

Mac 
* [Mou](http://mouapp.com/)


* [Markable.in](http://markable.in/)
* [Dillinger.io](http://dillinger.io/)


* [MaDe (Chrome)](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/oknndfeeopgpibecfjljjfanledpbkog)

(Sublime Text 2 + MarkdownEditing )
* [Sublime Text 2](http://www.sublimetext.com/2)
* [MarkdownEditing](http://ttscoff.github.com/MarkdownEditing/)
* [](http://lucifr.com/2012/07/12/markdownediting-for-sublime-text-2/)


## 
: <http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/>

<http://www.markdown.cn/#overview>

Post.title: Tech Blog
Post._content:
*blog1*

### Tools 
	Git + Github Pages + Node.js + Hexo + NexT Theme

### knowledge Base	
* __Git__ -- GitGit 2
* __Github__ --  [github](https://www.github.com) , repositoryGithub pages 1
* __Hexo__ -- Hexo, Hexo 1
* __NexT Theme__ --Hexo ThemeNexT 0.5
* __Markdown__ -- MarkdownMarkdown0.5

### Git
Git 
 
  

20Git

[Git introduction](https://www.liaoxuefeng.com/wiki/0013739516305929606dd18361248578c67b8067c8c017b000/)  

Git[Git Download](https://git-scm.com/download)

### Node.js
Node.jsHexoNode.js

nvm.nvmnode.js

* Download nvm 
  
		$ curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/creationix/nvm/v0.33.8/install.sh	

* install nvm

		$ cd .nvm/
		$ ./install.sh
* set bash profile

		$ export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm"
		$ [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh"
* install Node.js

		$ nvm install stable

### GitHub Page
GithubGitGithub PageGithub**GithubBlog**

account: _yourusername_  
sshGithub  

	git@github.com:_yourusername_/
httpGithub  
 
	https://github.com/_yourusername_/  

	$ git config --global user.name "Your Name"  
	$ git config --global user.email "email@example.com"

### Hexo
[Hexo](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/)   Node.js  Hexo  Markdown  Markdown  Hexo   

_.html_HexoMarkdownHexo_.html_hexo

* Install hexo

		$npm install hexo-cli -g
* set up hexo  
 
		$hexo init blog
		$cd blog
		$npm install
		$hexo server

### NexT
HexoNexTHexoNexT

 Hexo  _config.yml  Hexo 

   

 NexT  
Hexo  themes   NexT   
  
  

	$ cd your-hexo-site
	$ git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next

  

	#_config.yml,Themenext
	theme: next
  
	
	$hexo s --debug  
	INFO  Hexo is running at http://0.0.0.0:4000/. Press Ctrl+C to stop.

### Markdown
Markdown  Web HTMLHTML githubStackoverflow .  
[Markdown](http://www.markdown.cn/#acknowledgement)	

ENDING  
 
1. <http://zhaoweihao.me/2017/04/29/Hexo-Github-pages-%E5%88%9B%E5%BB%BA%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%AA%E5%B1%9E%E4%BA%8E%E8%87%AA%E5%B7%B1%E7%9A%84%E5%8D%9A%E5%AE%A2/>

2. <https://www.cnblogs.com/fengxiongZz/p/7707219.html>
